description: Sea breeze, grand prix pulse, and glamorous nights—soundtrack for Monaco's sunlit, moonlit moments.

items.name: Monaco Naval Museum
items.description: This is a fascinating museum featuring small models of some of the prominent and historical significance and popular sea vessels and ships. The museum was opened for public in the early 1990s. The museum houses the models for world famous Titanic and Nimitz ships. Nimitz is one of the biggest military ships in the world.
items.location_hint: Terrasses de Fontvieille, niveau 2, Avenue Albert II, 98000 Monaco

items.name: Casino Square
items.description: Casino Square is one of the most startling and shimmering places to visit in Monaco. This square is the go to place for the wealthiest in Monaco and the casino lovers from over the world. The square will greet you with sights of some of the most avant garde and luxurious cars you can find in the world including the top models from Rolls Royce, Bentley, Land Rover and many more. This sparkling place is home to few of the most popular casinos in the world – including Casino Monte Carlo. This is the place which also featured in James Bond and other Hollywood movies.
items.location_hint: Casino Square, Place du Casino, 98000 Monaco

items.name: Mont Agel
items.description: Mont Agel is a hilly neighbourhood situated near the border with France on the mountain range of Maritime Alps between Monaco and France. Mont Agel is the popular and the highest cliff on this incredible mountain range. Situated right at the border a part of this cliff lies in France. This is also the highest mountain in Monaco. Mont Agel is home to a beautiful village away from the hustle bustle of Monaco.

items.name: Jardin Exotique de Monaco
items.description: This is an exotic garden and an incredibly popular garden in Monaco. The garden is full of exotic plants and flora. The garden houses some incredible enthralling caves to explore. Delightful place full of picturesque and alluring spots to click your photographs amidst nature's beauty. The views are amazing from this elevated garden. One would have riveting views of the enticing sea and shimmering Monte Carlo from the garden area.

items.name: St Martin Gardens
items.description: This is a sparkling garden situated in Monaco Ville ward and overlooking the scintillating Mediterranean sea. You will find numerous species of exotic flowers and plants in this shimmering garden in Monaco. The garden is also full of beautiful natural landscapes and has amazing fountains, ethereal pools and some matchless views. One of the best places to wander and relax amidst the delightful surroundings.
